Detailed Description

Interface class for image fetching. The image names from SearchItems and SearchDescs can be used in this interface to download the actual images.

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

void WFAPI::ImageInterface::addImageListener ( ImageListener *  listener  ) 

Add a listener for image replies.

See also:
ImageListener
Parameters:
listener The ImageListener to add. It may not be deleted until it is removed by calling removeImageListener.

AsynchronousStatus WFAPI::ImageInterface::getImage ( const WFString &  imageName,
bool  getAsBuffer 
)

Send a asynchronous request for the image data for an image name. The image names from SearchItems and SearchDescs do not have image type extension so you need to add an appropriate one. Example: Image name from a SearchItem is "restaurant" add ".png" to it to make a full image name, "restaurant.png".

Parameters:
imageName The name of the image to get, make sure the name has an file extension, like ".png".
getAsBuffer True if the image should be stored in the memory as a buffer (uint8*). False if it should be written to file.
Returns:
The status and if status is OK the RequestID that will be returned in the imageListeners imageReply function.
